text: No they will be rendered alongside the module. Wn't recommend using styles for the email templates as they won't work well across clients. Instead you can add the `data-hse-inline-css="true"` to your stylesheet in the module and it will be handled by our inliner
I'd also be careful about what styles you inline, since it could potentially break the dnd functionality in the editor, So I'd avoid any styles that would impact our layout elements

Thanks for coming back to me Sarah!

Unfortunately I’m not a fan of inlining and not being able to add CSS to the head sections means losing control over things like custom fonts, dark mode media queries and perhaps VML.

PS. Where is the documentation for custom modules in dnd templates? I couldn’t find anything showcasing it?
